attributes.action: give equal rights to the Winter Fuel Allowance for all british pensioners living in Europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, if one retires to Europe before receiving the State Pension, there is no entitlement to Winter Fuel Allowance. If one receives the Pension and the Fuel Allowance before moving, it is distributed ever more. This inequality is illogical and unfair to those who for whatever reason left before Pension Age
